title: Improve homepage and header text contrast across light/dark modes

requirements.summary: Ensure the Home page value proposition headings have strong, mode-safe contrast against their card backgrounds.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the headings "Made with Care", "Quality Assured", and "Pure Ingredients" are visibly readable (no low-contrast/washed-out appearance) in light mode.
On the Home page, the headings "Made with Care", "Quality Assured", and "Pure Ingredients" are visibly readable (no low-contrast/washed-out appearance) in dark mode.

file_operations.description: Update the value proposition card heading styles (the three h3 elements) to use theme tokens intended for text on card backgrounds (e.g., card-foreground/foreground without opacity) so the headings maintain strong contrast in both light and dark modes.

requirements.summary: Remove hardcoded header brand-name color and use theme-aware styling that preserves contrast in light/dark modes.
acceptanceCriteria: In the sticky header, the brand name text (e.g., "BAU SARAS") is clearly readable in light mode.
In the sticky header, the brand name text (e.g., "BAU SARAS") is clearly readable in dark mode.

file_operations.description: Replace the hardcoded brand name text color with theme-based classes (foreground/card-foreground/primary as appropriate) so "BAU SARAS" remains high-contrast on the header background in both light and dark modes.
